wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Edward Dooley (15 December 1914 – 1975) was an English professional footballer. A right half, he played for his hometown club, Accrington Stanley. He was also on the books of Blackpool, but did not feature for the first team, and  Rochdale.

response: **"Tom Dooley" (song), American folksong based upon the above incident
** The Legend of Tom Dooley, a 1959 film starring Michael Landon, based on the folk song
* Tom Dooley (American football) (1934–2018), American football official
* Tom Dooley (racewalker) (born 1945), American race walker at the 1968 and 1972 Olympics
